com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.sensors

Class ADXSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.sensors.ADXSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PIDSource

    public class ADXSensor
extends java.lang.Object
implements PIDSource
    A class that merges the ADXL362 accelerometer with the ADXRS450 gyro, since they are both contained on one board.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ADXSensor(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.ADXL362 a, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.ADXRS450_Gyro g)
      Creates an ADXSensor that uses existing instances of the Accelerometer and Gyroscope.
      ADXSensor(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SPI.Port port)
      Creates an ADXSensor on port.
      ADXSensor(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SPI.Port port, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.interfaces.Accelerometer.Range range)
      Creates an ADXSensor on port, and sets the Accelerometer's range to range.

        Creates an ADXSensor on port, and sets the Accelerometer's range to range.
        Parameters:
        port - The SPI.Port this sensor is on.
        range - The range you want the Accelerometer to have.

        Parameters:

        g - The Gyroscope.
